structure.unit: SUPERVISION, EQUALIZATION, AND REVIEW OF ASSESSMENTS

law.catch_line: Explanation to be mailed to taxpayer.
law.text: The Department of Revenue shall draft, and the sheriff shall mail with the property tax bills annually, an explanation of the provisions of Acts 1979 (Ex. Sess.) ch. 25.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 243, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 1979 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 25, sec. 11, effective February 13, 1979.
